issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: euca-start-instances does not return correct information

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: It seems that {{StopInstances}} requests end up with responses whose instances' {{currentState}} and {{previousState}} elements are both {{pending}}. The latter should instead be {{stopped}}. {code:none} gholms@luna % PYTHONPATH=~gholms/src/euca2ools euca-start-instances --debug i-1AD14445 2013-01-08 14:49:02,949 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Method: POST 2013-01-08 14:49:02,949 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Path: /services/Eucalyptus/ 2013-01-08 14:49:02,950 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Data: 2013-01-08 14:49:02,950 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Headers: {} 2013-01-08 14:49:02,950 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Host: cloud.release.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773 2013-01-08 14:49:02,950 euca2ools [DEBUG]:establishing HTTP connection: kwargs={} 2013-01-08 14:49:02,950 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Token: None 2013-01-08 14:49:02,950 euca2ools [DEBUG]:using _calc_signature_2 2013-01-08 14:49:02,950 euca2ools [DEBUG]:query string: AWSAccessKeyId=FZGDXKXXIBLP6MAERCZS1&Action=StartInstances&InstanceId.1=i-1AD14445&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-01-08T22%3A49%3A02Z&Version=2009-11-30 2013-01-08 14:49:02,951 euca2ools [DEBUG]:string_to_sign: POST cloud.release.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773 /services/Eucalyptus/ AWSAccessKeyId=FZGDXKXXIBLP6MAERCZS1&Action=StartInstances&InstanceId.1=i-1AD14445&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-01-08T22%3A49%3A02Z&Version=2009-11-30 2013-01-08 14:49:02,951 euca2ools [DEBUG]:len(b64)=44 2013-01-08 14:49:02,951 euca2ools [DEBUG]:base64 encoded digest: Pm7VGndeWd0UNs5Rh1raLyaHOMnTNApY5FPGG8FqHU4= 2013-01-08 14:49:02,951 euca2ools [DEBUG]:query_string: AWSAccessKeyId=FZGDXKXXIBLP6MAERCZS1&Action=StartInstances&InstanceId.1=i-1AD14445&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-01-08T22%3A49%3A02Z&Version=2009-11-30 Signature: Pm7VGndeWd0UNs5Rh1raLyaHOMnTNApY5FPGG8FqHU4= send: 'POST /services/Eucalyptus/ HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: cloud.release.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773\r\nAccept-Encoding: identity\r\nContent-Length: 239\r\nContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8\r\nUser-Agent: Boto/2.5.2 (linux2)\r\n\r\nAWSAccessKeyId=FZGDXKXXIBLP6MAERCZS1&Action=StartInstances&InstanceId.1=i-1AD14445&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2013-01-08T22%3A49%3A02Z&Version=2009-11-30&Signature=Pm7VGndeWd0UNs5Rh1raLyaHOMnTNApY5FPGG8FqHU4%3D' reply: 'HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n' header: Content-Length: 303 header: Content-Type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 2013-01-08 14:49:04,515 euca2ools [DEBUG]:i-1AD144450pending0pending INSTANCE i-1AD14445 pending pending {code}

{'userregion': None, 'InstanceId': ['i-2CE840DE'], 'shell_configfile': '', 'deprecated_sec_key': None, 'deprecated_key_id': None, 'url': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None} 2013-09-09 21:45:14,657 DEBUG Config searching regions for option 'ec2-url' 2013-09-09 21:45:14,657 DEBUG Config section 'aws:us-east-1' 2013-09-09 21:45:14,657 INFO Config option 'ec2-url' = 'https://ec2.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/' 2013-09-09 21:45:14,657 DEBUG Config searching regions for option 'verify-ssl' 2013-09-09 21:45:14,657 DEBUG Config section 'aws:us-east-1' 2013-09-09
